ygData.subject: RE: Post Patch Procing
ygData.msgSnippet: When I first went to KFC at level 20 or so, I would fall off the Treehouse every single time.  By level 30, I could run to the top selos and drums no problemo!
ygData.messageBody:
When I first went to KFC at level 20 or so, I would fall off the Treehouse
every single time. By level 30, I could run to the top selos and drums no
problemo!

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 11:46 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Post Patch Procing

From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>

>-----Original Message-----
>From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:jht@...]
>Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 8:50 AM

>> Casting times have been implemented on several
activatable items.
>> This was done to correct issues that could arise from
people
>> chain-casting these items.

>Speaking of which, is it unreasonable to set our default
travelling pace to
>"Run" so that we don't have to turn this on whenever we log
in. Does anyone
>"walk" in this game?
